data.description: An everyday account with easy and secure banking, unlimited ANZ Transactions and Visa Debit card
data.name: ANZ Access Advantage

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be 12 years of age or older to apply

eligibility.additionalValue: You must be an Australian resident with an Australian residential and mailing address.

discounts.additionalInfo: Account holders may apply to waive the monthly account service fee on one nominated ANZ Access Advantage account if you meet the eligibility criteria

eligibility.additionalInfo: Receive a disability support pension or mobility allowance from Centrelink
A full-time student at an Australian educational institution
Deposit $2,000 or more by the last business day of the calendar month. You must satisfy this requirement to be eligible for the waiver in a particular month.

Have an ANZ Home Loan, ANZ Residential Investment Loan or ANZ Portfolio Facility and have your salary paid into your account. Loans not eligible include ANZ Simplicity PLUS, ANZ Money Saver (no longer sold), ANZ Easy Start (no longer sold) and ANZ Interest-in-Advance Residential Investment Loans.

Have a combined deposit balance of $50,000 in one or more of the following ANZ accounts: ANZ Access Advantage, Access Select, Premium Cash Management, Online Saver, Progress Saver, ANZ term deposits, V2 Plus, Passbook Savings, Premier Cheque

fees.additionalInfo: No monthly account service fee if you deposit at least $2,000 a month, are under 25 and meet our other eligibility criteria
fees.name: Account Service

fees.additionalInfo: A Dishonour Fee is only debited when the payment from your account that is declined was attempted via cheque or direct debit
fees.name: Dishonour Fee

fees.additionalInfo: Charged when any attempted periodical payment cannot be made due to a lack of cleared funds
fees.name: Periodical Payment Non-payment Fee

fees.additionalInfo: Applicable for a withdrawal from a non-ANZ ATM outside Australia (per withdrawal), and debited to your account at the same time as the withdrawal is debited
fees.name: Overseas ATM Transaction Fees

fees.additionalInfo: ANZ will charge 3% of the value of any International Transaction charged or credited to an ANZ account
fees.name: Overseas Transaction Fees

fees.additionalInfo: Providing bank cheques (Australian dollars only) This is a charge for issuing a bank cheque to an ANZ account holder.
fees.name: Bank Cheque Request at ANZ Branch

fees.additionalInfo: Providing bank cheques (Australian dollars only) This is a charge for issuing a bank cheque to an ANZ account holder.
fees.name: Bank Cheque Request through ANZ Internet Banking
Telegraphic transfer within Australia from your ANZ account to another account

features.additionalInfo: Access using ANZ Internet Banking or ANZ App

Unlimited ANZ transactions available using ANZ Internet Banking, ANZ Phone Banking, ANZ ATMs, ANZ Business Visa Debit and EFTPOS. Also includes any deposit, withdrawal or transfer at ANZ branches, cheques drawn by you and any cheque or manual merchant slip deposited to your account.

Our bank fraud protection promise
We’d like you to feel safe and secure about using your ANZ cards whenever and wherever you need to.
That’s why our fraud protection services offer the ANZ Fraud Money Back Guarantee.
You’ll be reimbursed for fraudulent transactions on your ANZ card provided you notify us promptly and didn't contribute to the loss.
Our fraud protection team is available 24/7. If you notice any unusual activity on your cards, please contact us straight away
PayTo is a new secure digital payment option that allows you to view, authorise and manage your payment agreements on eligible accounts (PDF) from within your ANZ Internet Banking.

Tap and pay for easier in-store shopping
Just set up your ANZ Visa Debit card on your digital wallet and use your mobile phone to tap and pay for everyday purchases wherever you can make contactless payments.

Get a better perspective of your money
Sometimes it’s the little things you don’t expect that can chip away at your savings. That’s why, we’ve created Your Money Report – it’s packed with insights to help you get to know your money better.

Get more for your money with Cashrewards
ANZ has teamed up with Australia’s leading cashback program Cashrewards. Join Cashrewards for free to access cashback offers from more than 2,000 popular retailers and get more for your money!

Create a PayID® on your eligible account (PDF) using your mobile phone, email or ABN/ACN (if eligible). With PayID, it's easier to receive payments or set up a PayTo agreement by sharing your PayID instead of your BSB and account number.
Use the ANZ App to make payments over $1,000. No codes. Just your voice.
features.additionalValue: Voice ID in the ANZ App

features.additionalInfo: Misplaced your card? No worries. You can temporarily block your card to keep it safe while you look for it. Then unblock your card in the ANZ App in a flash when you find it again.
